mapper.select: SELECT b.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM (SELECT unq, title, category, content, to_char(rdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') rdate, decode(status,'N','답변대기','답변완료') status, nik_name FROM INQUIRY_BOARD ORDER BY unq DESC ) a ) b WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startIndex} AND #{endIndex}
SELECT unq, title, category, content, to_char(rdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') rdate, to_char(rdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') udate, nik_name, re_content FROM INQUIRY_BOARD WHERE unq = #{unq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY_BOARD (unq, title, category, content, rdate, udate, writer, nik_name) VALUES (INQUIRY_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{category}, #{content}, sysdate, sysdate, #{writer}, #{nikName})
